RECAPTCHA.RECAPTCHA-IMAGE: Enter the words you read below

TOUR.WELCOME-CONTENT: 这是一个简短的户外活动编辑参观。接下来的几个步骤将指导您通过应用程序的不同部分来开始。按下ESC键可随时停止.
TOUR.PALETTE-CONTENT: 创建业务流程的所有可用构造都可以在这里找到。它们按逻辑分组。要打开一个群组，只需单击它:
TOUR.CANVAS-CONTENT: 这是您创建业务流程的工作空间。从左边的调色板中拖动元素，并将它们放到画布上，以开始建模.
TOUR.DRAGDROP-CONTENT: 下面是一个如何开始建模的示例:
TOUR.PROPERTIES-CONTENT: 在这里，您可以配置业务流程构造的属性。只需选择画布上的项目，它的属性就会显示出来。如果要编辑该属性，请单击它
TOUR.TOOLBAR-CONTENT: 所有操作都可以在这里找到:保存或验证模型、复制和粘贴流程的各个部分，等等。将鼠标悬停在按钮上，以获取操作的描述.
TOUR.END-CONTENT: 就这样! 现在可以开始对流程建模了。如果您有任何问题，请随时在 Alfresco Activiti Forum 上提问

BENDPOINT.TITLE: 弯曲点教程
BENDPOINT.DESCRIPTION:
当您使用序列流(流程步骤之间的箭头)将流程步骤彼此连接时，您可能会发现这些序列流彼此交叉，或者您希望以不同的方式排列它们。为此，您可以向序列流或从序列流中添加或删除一个弯曲点。

如下图所示，首先单击“add bendpoint”，然后单击序列流将其添加。请注意，序列流将向您显示一个绿色的指示，以显示可以在其中添加bendpoint。

再次删除bendpoint遵循类似的模式:单击“删除bendpoint”按钮，然后单击弯曲点再次删除bendpoint。

INVOLVE-PEOPLE.NO-MATCHING-RESULTS: 使用上面的搜索框查找用户或
INVOLVE-PEOPLE.USE-EMAIL: 选择使用电子邮件地址的人
INVOLVE-PEOPLE.EMAIL-HELP: 按回车键或单击按钮继续。这个人将被电子邮件通知或邀请注册

END-NONE-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 无特定触发器的结束事件

INTERMEDIATE-MESSAGE-CATCH-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 带有消息触发器的中间捕获事件

INTERMEDIATE-SIGNAL-CATCH-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 带有消息触发器的中间捕获事件

INTERMEDIATE-TIMER-CATCH-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 带有定时器触发器的中间捕获事件

INTERMEDIATE-NONE-THROW-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 没有特定触发器的中间事件

INTERMEDIATE-SIGNAL-THROW-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 带有信号触发器的中间事件

MESSAGE-FLOW.TITLE: Message flow
MESSAGE-FLOW.DESCRIPTION: 连接不同池中的元素的消息流

POOL.TITLE: Pool
POOL.DESCRIPTION: 用于构造流程定义的池

SCRIPTTASK.TITLE: 脚本任务
SCRIPTTASK.DESCRIPTION: 带有脚本逻辑的自动任务

SERVICETASK.TITLE: 服务任务
SERVICETASK.DESCRIPTION: 带有服务逻辑的自动任务

SEQUENCE-FLOW.TITLE: Sequence flow
SEQUENCE-FLOW.DESCRIPTION: 序列流定义活动的执行顺序

START-ERROR-EVENT.TITLE: Start error event
START-ERROR-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 捕获抛出的BPMN错误的启动事件

START-MESSAGE-EVENT.TITLE: Start message event
START-MESSAGE-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 带有消息触发器的启动事件

START-NONE-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 无特定触发器的启动事件

START-SIGNAL-EVENT.TITLE: 信号开始事件
START-SIGNAL-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 带有信号触发器的启动事件

START-TIMER-EVENT.TITLE: 定时器开始事件
START-TIMER-EVENT.DESCRIPTION: 带有计时器触发器的启动事件

TEXTANNOTATION.TITLE: 文本注释
TEXTANNOTATION.DESCRIPTION: 用于描述文本注释元素

USERTASK.TITLE: 用户任务
USERTASK.DESCRIPTION: 分配给特定人员的手工任务

CAMEL-CONTEXT.TITLE: Camel context
CAMEL-CONTEXT.DESCRIPTION: 一个可选的驼峰上下文定义，如果保持为空，则使用默认值.

COMPENSATION.TITLE: Is for compensation
COMPENSATION.DESCRIPTION: 标识此活动是否用于补偿目的的标志.

COLLAPSED-SUBPROCESS-REFERENCE.TITLE: Referenced Subprocess
COLLAPSED-SUBPROCESS-REFERENCE.DESCRIPTION: 引用包含在折叠子流程中的子流程.

ENDPOINT-URL.TITLE: Endpoint url
ENDPOINT-URL.DESCRIPTION: 向Mule发送消息所需的端点url.

EVENT-LISTENERS.TITLE: Event listeners
EVENT-LISTENERS.DESCRIPTION: 监听Activiti引擎中发生的任何事件。还可以将事件重新抛出为信号、消息或错误事件.

EXECUTION-LISTENERS.TITLE: Execution listeners
EXECUTION-LISTENERS.DESCRIPTION: 用于活动、流程、序列流、开始和结束事件的侦听器.

FORM-KEY.TITLE: Form key
FORM-KEY.DESCRIPTION: 提供对窗体的引用的窗体键.

FORM-PROPERTIES.TITLE: Form properties
FORM-PROPERTIES.DESCRIPTION: 使用表单属性列表定义表单.

MAILTASK-BCC.TITLE: Bcc
MAILTASK-BCC.DESCRIPTION: 这封邮件的密件。多个收件人在逗号分隔的列表中定义.

MAILTASK-CC.TITLE: Cc
MAILTASK-CC.DESCRIPTION: 这封邮件的抄送件。多个收件人在逗号分隔的列表中定义.

MAILTASK-CHARSET.TITLE: Charset
MAILTASK-CHARSET.DESCRIPTION: 允许更改电子邮件的字符集，这对于许多非英语语言是必要的.

MAILTASK-FROM.TITLE: From
MAILTASK-FROM.DESCRIPTION: 发件人电子邮件地址。如果没有提供，则使用从address配置的默认值.

MAILTASK-TEXT.TITLE: Text
MAILTASK-TEXT.DESCRIPTION: 电子邮件的内容，以防需要发送普通的非富电子邮件。可以与html结合使用，用于不支持丰富内容的电子邮件客户端。然后客户机将返回到这个纯文本替代方案.

MAILTASK-TO.TITLE: To
MAILTASK-TO.DESCRIPTION: 电子邮件的收件人。多个收件人在逗号分隔的列表中定义.

MULETASK-LANGUAGE.TITLE: Language
MULETASK-LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: 解析有效负载表达式的语言所需的定义，如juel.

MULETASK-PAYLOAD.TITLE: Payload expression
MULETASK-PAYLOAD.DESCRIPTION: 发送到Mule的消息的有效负载的必要定义.

MULETASK-RESULT-VARIABLE.TITLE: Result variable
MULETASK-RESULT-VARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: 返回负载的可选结果变量.

MULTI-INSTANCE-CONDITION.TITLE: Completion condition (Multi-instance)
MULTI-INSTANCE-CONDITION.DESCRIPTION: 定义多实例的完成条件.

MULTI-INSTANCE-TYPE.TITLE: Multi-instance type
MULTI-INSTANCE-TYPE.DESCRIPTION: 重复活动执行(并行或顺序)可以通过不同的循环类型显示.

MULTI-INSTANCE-VARIABLE.TITLE: Element variable (Multi-instance)
MULTI-INSTANCE-VARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: 为多实例定义元素变量.

PROCESS-ID.TITLE: Process identifier
PROCESS-ID.DESCRIPTION: 流程定义的唯一标识符.

PROCESS-NAMESPACE.TITLE: Target namespace
PROCESS-NAMESPACE.DESCRIPTION: 流程定义的目标名称空间.

PROCESS-VERSION.TITLE: Process version string (documentation only)
PROCESS-VERSION.DESCRIPTION: 用于文档目的的版本标识符.

RULE-EXCLUDE.TITLE: Exclude
RULE-EXCLUDE.DESCRIPTION: 使用规则属性作为排除.

SERVICETASK-CLASS.TITLE: Class
SERVICETASK-CLASS.DESCRIPTION: 实现服务任务逻辑的类.

SERVICETASK-DELEGATE-EXPRESSION.TITLE: Delegate expression
SERVICETASK-DELEGATE-EXPRESSION.DESCRIPTION: 使用委托表达式定义的服务任务逻辑.

SERVICETASK-EXPRESSION.TITLE: Expression
SERVICETASK-EXPRESSION.DESCRIPTION: 使用表达式定义的服务任务逻辑.

SERVICETASK-RESULT-VARIABLE.TITLE: Result variable name
SERVICETASK-RESULT-VARIABLE.DESCRIPTION: 存储服务任务结果的流程变量名.

SEQUENCE-FLOW-CONDITIONAL.TITLE: Conditional flow
SEQUENCE-FLOW-CONDITIONAL.DESCRIPTION: 定义带有条件的序列流.

SEQUENCE-FLOW-DEFAULT.TITLE: Default flow
SEQUENCE-FLOW-DEFAULT.DESCRIPTION: 将序列流定义为默认值.

SIGNAL-DEFINITIONS.TITLE: Signal definitions
SIGNAL-DEFINITIONS.DESCRIPTION: 在流程中的信号捕获和抛出事件中使用的信号的定义.

MESSAGE-DEFINITIONS.TITLE: Message definitions
MESSAGE-DEFINITIONS.DESCRIPTION: 在流程中的消息捕获和抛出事件中使用的消息的定义.

TIMER-DATE.TITLE: Time date in ISO-8601
TIMER-DATE.DESCRIPTION: 使用ISO-8601日期定义定义计时器.

TIMER-DURATION.TITLE: Time duration (e.g. PT5M)
TIMER-DURATION.DESCRIPTION: 使用ISO-8601持续时间定义计时器.

USERTASK-SEND-EMAIL.TITLE: Allow email notifications
USERTASK-SEND-EMAIL.DESCRIPTION: 允许系统在分配任务时通知受让人.

MODEL.NAME: Name
MODEL.SAVE.NEWVERSION: Save this as a new version?  This means you can always go back to a previous version
MODEL.SAVE.ERROR: Unexpected error: could not save model
MODEL.VALIDATIONERRORS: Note that the model contains validation errors. This means that the model can not be deployed on the Activiti Engine in its current state.
MODEL.CONFLICT.WRITE: Could not save model: '{{userFullName}}' has made changes to this model
MODEL.CONFLICT.WRITE.OPTIONS: Select an option to resolve this conflict:
EVENT_TYPE.ACTIVITY.COMPENSATE.TOOLTIP: An activity is about to be executed as a compensation for another activity. The event targets the activity that is about to be executed for compensation
EVENT_TYPE.ACTIVITY.COMPLETED.TOOLTIP: An activity has been completed successfully
EVENT_TYPE.ACTIVITY.ERROR.RECEIVED.TOOLT: An activity has received an error event. Dispatched before the actual error has been received by the activity
EVENT_TYPE.MEMBERSHIP.CREATED.TOOLTIP: A new membership has been created
EVENT_TYPE.MEMBERSHIP.DELETED.TOOLTIP: A single membership has been deleted
EVENT_TYPE.MEMBERSHIPS.DELETED.TOOLTIP: All memberships in the related group have been deleted. No individual events will be dispatched due to possible performance reasons
EVENT_TYPE.TASK.ASSIGNED.TOOLTIP: A task as been assigned. This is thrown alongside with an ENTITY_UPDATED event
EVENT_TYPE.TASK.COMPLETED.TOOLTIP: A task has been completed. Dispatched before the task entity is deleted
EVENT_TYPE.UNCAUGHT.BPMNERROR.TOOLTIP: When a BPMN Error was thrown, but was not caught within in the process
EVENT_TYPE.VARIABLE.CREATED.TOOLTIP: A new variable has been created
EVENT_TYPE.VARIABLE.DELETED.TOOLTIP: An existing variable has been deleted
EVENT_TYPE.VARIABLE.UPDATED.TOOLTIP: An existing variable has been updated
